original_text: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.
korean_text: 우리가 주목하는 것은 보이는 것이 아니요 보이지 않는 것이니 보이는 것은 잠깐이요 보이지 않는 것은 영원함이라

sentences.original_text: While we look not at the things which are seen
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 보이는 것들을 보지 않는 동안

sentences.original_text: but at the things which are not seen:
for the things which are seen are temporal;
but the things which are not seen are eternal.
